movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.overview: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological tests.

movies.title: Inception
movies.overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.overview: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.overview: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.overview: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.overview: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.overview: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team to stop Loki and his alien army.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.overview: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

movies.title: Joker
movies.overview: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.overview: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.overview: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.overview: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.
